arresto.error: An error occurred while trying to shut down the virtual machine
arresto.success: The virtual machine is shutting down

avvia.error: An error occurred while trying to start the virtual machine

connetti.msg02: Locate your private key file (e.g., my-nivola-key.pem). The wizard automatically detects the key used to launch the instance.
connetti.msg03: The key does not have to be publicly visible for SSH to work. Use this command if necessary
connetti.msg04: Connect to your instance using its IP
connetti.msg05: If you need help connecting to your instance, please see our connection documentation.

elimina.error: An error occurred while deleting virtual machine
elimina.success: VM delete operation was sent successfully
elimina.testo: The virtual machine will be permanently deleted.
elimina.titolo: Are you sure to delete the selected vm instance?

manage.error: An error occurred while loading information

modifica_flavour.success: Virtual Machine Type Update operation started successfully

nuova.error: An error occurred while trying to create the virtual machine
nuova.success: The virtual machine creation operation started successfully

network.scegli_region: Choose the Network Settings for the VM instance

riepilogo.creazione_conferma: CONFIRM AND CREATE THE VIRTUAL MACHINE
riepilogo.creazione_msg01: Creating the virtual machine may take some time.
riepilogo.creazione_msg02: You will be notified when the operation is complete.
riepilogo.descrizione: Make sure you have selected the correct options, then start creating the virtual machine.

sicurezza.chiavi_creazione_01: To create a VM instance you must enter an SSH key to use
sicurezza.chiavi_creazione_02: It is possible to generate new keys or import existing ones for this Account by going to the section
sicurezza.chiavi_creazione_link_desc_02: , or create it immediately using the features on the right
sicurezza.chiavi_non_disponibili: There are no SSH keys available for this Account.
sicurezza.password_memo: The password, once entered, will no longer be viewable from the Service Portal
sicurezza.password_pattern: The password must be between 10 and 16 characters long, must contain at least one lowercase letter, one uppercase letter, </br> one number and one special character [# $ ^ + = ! * () @% &] "
sicurezza.scegli_chiave: Select an SHH Key to allow access to this instance
sicurezza.scegli_password: Insert the administration password for your VM instance

template.nome_error: Name must start with a lowercase letter followeb by up to 50 lowercase letters, numbers or hyphens

reboot.error: An error occurred while trying to restart the virtual machine
reboot.success: The VM restart request has been successfully submitted.
reboot.titolo: Do you confirm the restart of the selected virtual machine?

snapshot.label: Snapshot
snapshot.no_data: There are no snapshots for this VM

elimina.error: An error occurred while deleting the Snapshot
elimina.success: The request to delete the Snapshot was successful
elimina.testo: The Removal of the Snapshot implies the definitive cancellation

nuova.error: An error occurred while trying to create the snapshot
nuova.error_presente: Operation not allowed Name already present
nuova.nome_completo: Full name assigned to the snapshot
nuova.nome_pattern:
Name must start with a non-numeric character
Length must be between (8-40) characters.
special characters accepted: '_', '-'
Ex: snapshot_1, snapshot-1
nuova.nome_presente: A Snapshot with the same name already exists
nuova.success: The snapshot creation operation completed successfully

revert.error: An error occurred while restoring Snapshot
revert.success: The Snapshot restore request was successful
revert.testo:
The current disk and memory states are cleared
and the virtual machine reverts to the disk and memory states of the primary snapshot

stato.pending: This instance is in temporary state
stato.undefined: This instance is in undefined state
stato.error: the instance is in error state
stato.unknown: This instance is in unknown state
